node.title: Robert Durst Indicted for 1982 Death of His Wife Following Susan Berman Murder Conviction
node.alt: Millionaire real estate heir Robert Durst has been indicted for the 1982 murder of his wife Kathie Durst following a recent conviction for the murder of his friend Susan Berman. In the picture above, Durst was sentenced on October 14, in Los Angeles, to life without the possibility of parole for the 2000 murder of Susan Berman.
node.description: Monday's announcement of Durst's indictment comes as the 78-year-old was charged for the death of his wife, Kathie Durst, on October 22 in New York.
node.content:
["Millionaire real estate heir Robert Durst has been indicted for the 1982 murder of his wife Kathie Durst following a recent conviction for the murder of Susan Berman.", "Monday's announcement of Durst's indictment comes as the 78-year-old was charged for the death of Kathie Durst on October 18 in New York, according to the Associated Press.", "", "
Millionaire real estate heir Robert Durst has been indicted for the 1982 murder of his wife Kathie Durst following a recent conviction for the murder of his friend Susan Berman. In the picture above, Durst was sentenced on October 14, in Los Angeles, to life without the possibility of parole for the 2000 murder of Susan Berman.
", "Kathie Durst went missing in January 1982 when she was 29 years old. Authorities were never able to find her body, but her family declared her as legally dead in 2017. Durst divorced his wife in 1990, claiming legal abandonment as the reason for his decision, according to the AP.", "Robert Durst was recently hospitalized with COVID-19 and placed on a ventilator, according to one of his lawyers.", "This is a developing story and will be updated with more information as it becomes available."]
